'''''Two Tube''''' is an Irish youth-aimed programming strand broadcast on [[RTÃ Two]] in Ireland, from 17:35 - 19:00, on weekdays. ''Two Tube'' replaced [[TTV (RTÃ)|TTV]], which was basically the same show with few differences, on Monday 7 September 2009. The shows on Two Tube are aimed at the 15-24 demographic.
It is presented by Paul Walsh
==Format==
It was previously presented by [[Dylan Haskins]] and [[Stephen Byrne (broadcaster)|Stephen Byrne]]. And before them it was presented by Dara Quilty from September 2009 - January 2010. From September 2010 - June 2011 it was presented by Sinead Kennedy. The new season (Sept 2011) has started with Royseven singer Paul Walsh hosting, and longtime contributor Mike Sheridan stepping in to the presenters chair occasionally.
''Two Tube'' is primarily a review show with regular contributors:
*Sarah Hughes(Sports on Mondays) *Blanaid Hennessy(Fashion on Tuesdays) *Mike Sheridan/Paul Byrne (Movies on Wednesdays) *Conor Behan (Music on Thursdays) *Mike Sheridan (Entertainment news on Fridays)
===''Two Tube'' broadcasts these programmes=== Juice * ''[[Neighbours]]'' * ''[[The Simpsons]]'' * ''[[Home and Away]]''
==External links== * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/twotube/ ''Two Tube'' Website]
